Interface ec.transform.ClassFilter

public interface interface ClassFilter
ClassFilters are objects which take ClassFile objects and perform transformations on them and also perform admission checks.

transformClass(ClassFile)
Transform the given ClassFile as needed to allow it to be admitted into the system.

transformClass 
 public abstract ClassFile transformClass(ClassFile cf) throws DoNotAdmitException
Transform the given ClassFile as needed to allow it to be admitted into the system. This method is allowed to perform destructive modifications to its argument. It returns its argument or a new ClassFile (if it choses to create a new one rather than modify the old). It throws a DoNotAdmitException if the class does not conform to the requirements the ClassFilter enforces.
N.B. The admitClass method is deprecated (with prejudice).

Parameters:
cf - the ClassFile to transform
Returns:
a new or modified ClassFile.
Throws: DoNotAdmitException
thrown if the class should not be allowed in to the system
